programme.desc: The team turns their focus back to the mesa and almost immediately gets more evidence of something buried deep within it; Brandon returns to the ranch with Utah's Attorney General, who is eager to find out who is monitoring the ranch.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Throughout history, many have claimed to be able to see into the future. These mystics, prophets, and clairvoyants received visions of events that changed the course of history.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: The team makes a shocking discovery while drilling into the mesa on Skinwalker Ranch.

programme.title: South Park: Christian Rock Hard
programme.desc: Christian Hard Rock: The boys form a band called Moop, but disagree on what direction they should take. Cartman leaves the band and bets them he will have a platinum record first! (S7, E09)

programme.title: South Park: Grey Dawn
programme.desc: Grey Dawn: There's an epidemic in South Park. An epidemic of senior citizen related driving accidents! When their licenses are all revoked they decide to fight back military style! (S7, E10)

programme.title: South Park: Casa Bonita
programme.desc: Casa Bonita: Cartman is overjoyed at going to a Mexican restaurant for Kyle's birthday but is crushed when he finds out Butters is invited instead. He'll have to make Butters "disappear". (S7, E11)

programme.title: South Park: All About Mormons
programme.desc: All About The Mormons: A new family moves to South Park and their son Gary is an unusually perfect Mormon - this angers the boys no end! Will Stan beat him up or go for a family dinner?! (S7, E12)

programme.title: South Park: Butt Out
programme.desc: Butt Out: When the boys' smoking leads to a nasty incident, it's the cigarettes that are blamed rather than them. Cue the glutinous Rob Reiner to arrive in town with his anti-smoking lobby! (S7, E13)

programme.title: South Park: Raisins
programme.desc: Raisins: When Wendy breaks up with Stan he takes it hard. The boys decide to take him to the restaurant Raisins, where all of the employees are preteen girls who enjoy wearing heavy make-up. (S7, E14)

programme.title: South Park: It's Christmas In Canada
programme.desc: It's Christmas In Canada: A law is passed in Canada, meaning poor lil' Ike must return to his biological parents. The boys set out to stop this but who is the evil mastermind behind the law? (S7, E15)

programme.title: South Park: Good Times with Weapons
programme.desc: Good Times With Weapons: After buying martial arts weapons at a local flea market, the boys are transformed into anime Japanese Warriors, with dire consequences for poor Professor Chaos. (S8, E01)

programme.title: South Park: Hotter Than Summer: AWESOM-O
programme.desc: AWESOM-O: When Cartman disguises himself as a robot in order to play a prank on Butters, he ends up being used by movie execs to come up with film ideas and captured by the military! (S8, E05)

programme.title: South Park: Up the Down Steroid
programme.desc: Up The Down Steroid: Jimmy is due to take part in the Special Olympics but what dodgy substance is he talked into taking? Cartman fakes being disabled so he can enter and win a $1,000. (S8, E02)

programme.title: South Park: Goobacks
programme.desc: Goobacks: South Park is swamped by workers from the future, who take all the jobs for less pay. The men of South Park go to unusual lengths to stop them. "Dey turk err jurbs!" (S8, E07)

programme.title: South Park: The Jeffersons
programme.desc: The Jeffersons: A new family arrive in South Park with a little boy called Blanket, a fairground in the garden and a dad with a penchant for singing and cosmetic surgery. Guess who? Shamone! (S8, E06)

programme.title: South Park: Douche and Turd
programme.desc: Douche and Turd: The pupils of South Park Elementary are called to vote for a new mascot. With the choices being a "giant douche" and a "turd sandwich" is there any point? (S8, E08)

programme.title: South Park: Something Wall-Mart This Way Comes
programme.desc: Something Wall-Mart This Way Comes: When a mall is built in South Park, the townsfolk become addicted to shopping - it'll take the boys hunting down its evil "heart" to end their misery! (S8, E09)

programme.title: South Park: Preschool
programme.desc: Pre-School: The boys are pooping their pants after hearing that Trent, a notorious bully from their pre-school years, is being released from juvenile hall - guess who put him there? (S8, E10)

programme.desc: The time has finally come for Cartman to let a special someone know exactly how he feels.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman finally admits he's fat and immediately gets a mobility scooter.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman infiltrates the NSA and doesn’t like what he finds in his personal file.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman sees Token as a threat to all humanity.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Randy is harboring a giant secret and the pressure is getting to him. Meanwhile, Cartman calls Stan a cissy.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman considers himself the top on-line restaurant reviewer in South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: While the boys are waiting for the school bus, Cartman explains the odd nightmare he had the previous night involving alien visitors.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When Cartman's environmental essay wins a national contest, America's sweetheart, Kathie Lee Gifford, comes to South Park to present the award.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Is the new planetarium a harmless place to learn about the solar system or the scene of a diabolical plot to control the minds of South Park's citizens?
programme.sub-title: Roger Ebert Should Lay Off the Fatty Foods

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman is pursued by the FBI for committing a hate crime and lands in juvenile hall.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman decides to seek friendship using the Internet and finds an older man who is more than willing to be his friend...and more.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman's family and friends have intervened and are forcing him to trim down. While Cartman's away, Kenny's star is on the rise when he gets his own reality TV show.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: After the other boys explain to Cartman that pubes don't count unless you grow your own, Cartman realizes he's been tricked by the school bully, Scott Tenorman.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman inherits a million dollars from his grandmother and fulfills his lifelong dream of owning his own amusement park: Cartmanland!

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman plans to learn all of Butters' innermost secrets and then use them against him, by pretending to be Butters' new best friend, a robot named AWESOM-O.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: After sustaining a severe head injury, Cartman appears to have the power to see into the future. South Park detectives are quick to enlist his help in cracking unsolved murder cases.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman is sure he's dead and Butters is sure that Eric Cartman's ghost is haunting him. Together they attempt to make amends to all the people Cartman has wronged over the years.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: After the sudden on-set of the disease Gingervitis, Cartman rallies all other ginger kids to rise up and assume their role as the master race.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Al Gore warns the school about the threat of Manbearpig.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When Cartman's mom realizes she can't control her son anymore, she gets help from an expert. The "Dog Whisperer" may have what it takes but Eric Cartman's not going down without a fight.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: South Park Elementary faces strong opposition to the topic of evolution. Cartman's too busy to notice as he plans to propel himself into the future on the precise release date of the newest, hottest game console.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Eric Cartman has frozen himself in an attempt to make his three-week wait for a Nintendo Wii pass quickly. A freak accident landed him over 500 years in the future and now, he's stuck in a Godless world on the brink of war with no Nintendo Wii.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When his "ultimate plan" to embarrass Butters backfires, Cartman struggles to keep his classmates from seeing a compromising photograph. Meanwhile, Butters is sent to a special camp where they "Pray the Gay Away."

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman discovers the joys of having Tourette’s syndrome. Drunk with the power of saying whatever he wants without getting in trouble for it, he lines up national TV coverage to take advantage of his new life with no filters.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman finds himself fighting for his life after a routine tonsillectomy goes wrong. When Kyle becomes infected with Cartman's ailment, the two won't stop for anything as they search for a cure that will reverse their otherwise certain mortality.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The Coon rises from the trash and takes his place as a lone vigilante who wipes out crime in the town of South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman's dream of living the life of a pirate will come true if he can just get to Somalia.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle gets in on the ground floor of Cartman’s latest business venture, The Crack Baby Athletic Association.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys are getting close to discovering the truth about the first Thanksgiving.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When Ike hits puberty, he and Kyle start to grow apart. To save their relationship, Kyle takes Ike to see a live performance of Yo Gabba Gabba.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle just wants to play video games with his little brother. But, when Ike doesn’t want to play with him anymore, Kyle is afraid that the next generation is passing him by.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman considers himself the top on-line restaurant reviewer in South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle's mom won't let him keep his new pet, an elephant because it's so huge. So the boys turn turn to the Dr. Mephesto to genetically engineer a smaller elephant.
programme.sub-title: An Elephant Makes Love To A Pig

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: While South Park Elementary is attempting to stage a non-denominational holiday play that won't offend (or entertain) anyone, Kyle checks himself into the South Park mental asylum.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys' discovery of a prehistoric relic spawns a monster that threatens to destroy South Park and the world.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Mr. Mackey, the school counselor, is fired and turns to drugs and alcohol. Meanwhile, when the boys find out what it means to be circumcised they try to save Ike from his Bris.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny are caught up in the latest fad from Japan: Chinpoko Mon!

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When Cartman discovers the Tooth Fairy is paying a premium price for his lost teeth, he and the boys seize the opportunity to make some cash.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle needs a kidney transplant and Cartman is discovered to be the perfect donor. Cartman gladly offers his kidney to Kyle -- for the price of $10 million dollars.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: To get back at his parents for not letting him go to a concert, Kyle tells the police that his parents molested him. Soon, the whole town is free of adults and divided into two rival cities.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Mr. Garrison gets fed up with long lines, delayed flights and the airline industry in general and invents his own transportation device.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman convinces the boys to "toilet paper" their teacher's house, but Kyle is overwhelmed with guilt.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle chooses Stan, Kenny, and Butters to celebrate his birthday at Casa Bonita. When Cartman finds out he's not invited, he arranges for Butters to conveniently go "missing."

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: As Mr. Garrison enjoys his new womanly attributes after his sex change, the rest of the town gets in touch with their inner feelings too.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys try to rescue their new friend Willzyx, a talking space whale, from the Denver Sea Park, and with the help of MASA (Mexican Aeronautica y Spacia Administracion) get him home to the moon for $200.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle and his family are moving to San Francisco. The only way Stan can get his best friend back is to convince everyone to start driving hybrid cars.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When the entire contents of the world’s imagination lay open before them, Stan and Kyle step right in. Back in South Park, Cartman swears he’s seen a leprechaun.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan and Kyle are being held in the bowels of the Pentagon until they tell the government how they got into Imaginationland. Meanwhile, Cartman simply won’t rest until he finds Kyle and gets him to make good on their bet to suck his balls.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Inside Imaginationland, Stan and Butters engage in the battle of their lives as they fight the army of evil imaginary forces. Meanwhile, Cartman goes all the way to the Supreme Court to get Kyle to pay up on their bet.

programme.desc: Stan and Kyle are hooked on Guitar Hero. Unfortunately, Stan’s superior skills on the video game damage his friendship with Kyle.

programme.desc: Randy steps forward with a solution to fix the desperate state of the economy.

programme.title: ABC World News Now

programme.title: The Swift Effect
programme.desc: Focusing on Miami where Taylor returns to the U.S., examining her effect on the city's economy and spotlighting the University of Miami's course inspired by her branding and influence.

programme.title: The Swift Effect
programme.desc: A look at Taylor Swift's lasting legacy and where her influence may lead next; looking through the lens of individuals she's uplifted, such as a photographer who's documented her career for over a decade, we see the ripple effects of her journey.

programme.title: The Swift Effect

programme.title: 60 Minutes
programme.desc: The oldest and most-watched newsmagazine on television gets the real story on America's most prevalent issues. CBS News correspondents contribute segments to each hourlong episode. Topics range from hard news coverage to politics, lifestyle, pop culture, business, health, and science. The correspondents and contributors include Lesley Stahl, Scott Pelley, Anderson Cooper, Bill Whitaker, Sharyn Alfonsi, Jon Wertheim and Norah O'Donnell .

programme.title: 60 Minutes
programme.desc: The oldest and most-watched newsmagazine on television gets the real story on America's most prevalent issues. CBS News correspondents contribute segments to each hourlong episode. Topics range from hard news coverage to politics, lifestyle, pop culture, business, health, and science. The correspondents and contributors include Lesley Stahl, Scott Pelley, Anderson Cooper, Bill Whitaker, Sharyn Alfonsi, Jon Wertheim and Norah O'Donnell .

programme.desc: Larry leaves for Mypos to bring Balki back to America, but instead decides he wants to live in Mypos, too.

programme.desc: Larry and Balki believe a lost wedding ring is stuck inside the neighbor's turkey and try to get it back.

programme.desc: Larry and Balki have an alarm put in the car, but it keeps going off all night.

programme.desc: When Balki's artistic inspiration is stolen, Balki loses the ability to draw his daily comic strip.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: THE PPT IS THE FIRST LEAGUE OF ITS KIND AND THE TOUGHEST FIELD IN THE HISTORY OF POKER. THE STAKES ARE HIGH… 2.5 MILLION DOLLARS AND THE TITLE OF “THE BEST OF THE BEST”.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: The World Poker Tour makes land for the Jack Binion World Poker Open.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: The Commerce Casino serves up a nearly $4,000,000 prize pool in this L.A. Poker Classic.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: Season 18 is underway in Las Vegas, as six remaining players take their seats for a shot at over half a million dollars.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: There are four remaining in the fight for over $500,000. Chance Kornuth is looking to add another huge cash to his tournament poker resume but is trailing the new chip leader, Tuan Phan, by only a small margin.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: As we approach a dramatic finish to the Gardens Casino WPT Main Event, the tides have turned.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: Six remaining players square off on the felt of the WPT Borgata Final Table where one player will be crowned a WPT Champion and receive over $600,000.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: The action continues at WPT Borgata. After the final table’s first elimination, five remaining players inch closer and closer to a WPT trophy.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: Veerab Zakarian leads the way of the three remaining at the WPT Borgata final table. Can he hang on to secure the title of WPT Champion or will one of the shorter stacks find a way to battle back?

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: Another name will be added to the Mike Sexton WPT Champions Cup after the conclusion of the WPT L.A. Poker Classic Main Event, but first, a winner must be decided.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: Bala Patur leads the way, but former WPT Champion Matas Cimbolas is heating up and is now only behind by a small margin.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: We are down to four players at the final table of the WPT L.A. Poker Classic. WPT Champion Matas Cimbolas, who finished second in this event in 2019, is still in the hunt for the title.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: Over 300 players entered the WPT Gardens Poker Championship and now only 6 remain.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: Ryan Salunga leads the final four players of the WPT Gardens Poker Championship. Others vying for the title include Brad Owen, Ky Nguyen, and Chris Lee.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: Playdown to a WPT Champion continues at the final table of the WPT Gardens Championship.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: Four days of tournament poker action comes down to this. A field of 346 players has narrowed to just three and only one will emerge victorious.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.sub-title: WPT Daniel Arsham Celebrity Invitational - Part 1
programme.desc: The World Poker Tour proudly presents the WPT Daniel Arsham Celebrity Invitational Sit and Go, a single table poker event bringing together an exciting lineup of star power and poker talent.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.sub-title: WPT Daniel Arsham Celebrity Invitational - Part 2
programme.desc: The WPT Daniel Arsham Celebrity Invitational Sit and Go continues as the star-studded cast of players battle for the custom Veiled Porsche sculpture created by renowned contemporary artist Daniel Arsham.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.sub-title: WPT Daniel Arsham Celebrity Invitational - Part 3
programme.desc: From a field of six, only four players remain in the WPT Daniel Arsham Celebrity Invitational Sit and Go.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: THE PPT IS THE FIRST LEAGUE OF ITS KIND AND THE TOUGHEST FIELD IN THE HISTORY OF POKER. THE STAKES ARE HIGH… 2.5 MILLION DOLLARS AND THE TITLE OF “THE BEST OF THE BEST”.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: THE PPT IS THE FIRST LEAGUE OF ITS KIND AND THE TOUGHEST FIELD IN THE HISTORY OF POKER. THE STAKES ARE HIGH… 2.5 MILLION DOLLARS AND THE TITLE OF “THE BEST OF THE BEST”.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: WPT brings you final table action from Aruba at the UltimateBet Ultimate Poker Classic.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: The World Poker Tour visits the Caribbean for the PokerStars Caribbean Adventure.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.sub-title: WPT Seminole Hard Rock Showdown 2021 - Part 1
programme.desc: WPT hits Hollywood, FL to host the Seminole Hard Rock Poker Showdown. This tournament drew a field of 2,482 entrants marking the largest field of any WPT event.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.sub-title: WPT Seminole Hard Rock Showdown 2021 - Part 2
programme.desc: Sonny Franco has maintained the chip lead at this final table, but seasoned pro Brek Schutten is right on his heels.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.sub-title: WPT Seminole Hard Rock Showdown 2021 - Part 3
programme.desc: It’s crunch time in Hollywood, Florida as only one of three remaining players can be crowned champion receiving over $1 million and have their name forever engraved in the Mike Sexton WPT Champions Cup.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.sub-title: LAPC Rockstar Energy High Roller 2019 - Part 1
programme.desc: The first-ever televised WPT High Roller event features some of the best players in the world including Champions Club members Olivier Busquet and Darren Elias at Commerce Casino.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.sub-title: LAPC Rockstar Energy High Roller 2019 - Part 2
programme.desc: The fight to win $425,000 is down to five players with Alex Foxen in the lead and two-time WPT Champion Sam Panzica in contention.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.sub-title: LAPC Rockstar Energy High Roller 2019 - Part 3
programme.desc: Alex Foxen, Nick Petrangelo, and Maria Ho fight to the finish line at Commerce Casino.

programme.desc: Good morning, everyone! Over the past few weeks, we've been soaking up the sun at Parer's Resort, nestled above Bishop, California, in the stunning Eastern Sierras. programme.desc: Wow, holy Eastern Sierra! It's been a full month of trout shows, and we've been trying to cover as much as possible with trout fishing in the creeks above Bishop. programme.title: Entrance
programme.desc: Things lurking on the periphery of people's lives lead to horrific conclusions.

programme.title: Mischief Night
programme.desc: Emily, blind since a car accident killed her mother, has to protect herself and loved ones from an intruder.

programme.title: Puppet Master: The Littlest Reich
programme.desc: A man sells a nefarious-looking puppet at a small-town convention for some quick cash. Terror soon strikes when an ancient evil animates the other puppets and sends them on a bloody killing spree.

programme.title: VFW
programme.desc: A typical night for veterans at a VFW turns into a battle for survival when a desperate teen runs into the bar. When a gang of punks come looking for her, the vets use every weapon at their disposal to protect themselves from an unrelenting attack.

programme.title: The Tortured
programme.desc: A couple (Erika Christensen, Jesse Metcalfe) hatch a twisted plan to take revenge on the man (Bill Moseley) who killed their son.

programme.title: Do Not Disturb
programme.desc: Hollywood screenwriter Don Malek (Stephen Geoffreys) holes up in a seedy hotel and scripts a diabolical plan for revenge using his own hands.

programme.title: ATM
programme.desc: A murderous assailant traps three people (Alice Eve, Josh Peck, Brian Geraghty) in a small kiosk containing an automatic teller machine.

programme.title: The Pool
programme.desc: Day is stranded in a partially filled deep pool next to a crocodile farm.

programme.title: The Other Lamb
programme.desc: A young woman born into an all-female cult beings to question the teachings of her leader.

programme.title: Dark Summer
programme.desc: Alone under house arrest, a teenager (Keir Gilchrist) experiences a terrifying brush with the supernatural.

programme.title: The House That Jack Built
programme.desc: In five episodes, failed architect and vicious sociopath Jack recounts his elaborately orchestrated murders -- each, as he views them, a towering work of art that defines his life's work as a serial killer in the Pacific Northwest.

programme.title: Raze
programme.desc: A woman (Zoe Bell) is abducted and brought to an underground lair, where she is forced to fight other innocent victims for the amusement of unseen spectators.

programme.title: Bound to Vengeance
programme.desc: The victim (Tina Ivlev) of a violent assault escapes and turns the tables on her tormentor (Richard Tyson), who may be holding other women prisoner.

programme.title: Knives and Skin
programme.desc: In the wake of a high school student's mysterious disappearance, a collective awakening seems to overcome the town's teenage girls -- gathering in force until it can no longer be contained.

programme.title: Wyrmwood
programme.desc: A survivor (Jay Gallagher) of a zombie plague prepares to slash his way through a horde of sinister soldiers and ravenous monsters to rescue his kidnapped sister (Bianca Bradey).

programme.desc: The victim (Tina Ivlev) of a violent assault escapes and turns the tables on her tormentor (Richard Tyson), who may be holding other women prisoner.

programme.title: Depraved
programme.desc: A disillusioned field surgeon who is suffering from post-traumatic stress disorder makes a man out of body parts and brings him to life in a Brooklyn loft.

programme.title: Mandy
programme.desc: An outsider seeks bloody vengeance against the sadistic cult leader who destroyed his peaceful existence.

programme.title: The Witch in the Window
programme.desc: When Simon brings his 12-year-old son to rural Vermont to help flip an old farmhouse, they soon learn that the house is already occupied by the malicious spirit of a previous owner.

programme.title: The Sadness
programme.desc: As Taiwan succumbs to a viral pandemic that transforms peaceful citizens into sadistic, bloodthirsty maniacs, a young couple must battle to be reunited before they too become infected.

programme.title: Saloum
programme.desc: Shot down after fleeing a coup and extracting a drug lord from Guinea-Bissau, a group of mercenaries must lie low at a remote holiday camp, stash their stolen haul, and repair their plane to escape back to Dakar, Senegal.

programme.title: Anything for Jackson
programme.desc: A sinister couple hatch a supernatural scheme to resurrect their dead grandson through a pregnant woman.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: On a vacation in Toscana, a Danish family instantly becomes friends with a Dutch family. Months later, the Danish couple receives an unexpected invitation. It doesn't take long before the joy of reunion is replaced with misunderstandings.

programme.title: Revenge
programme.desc: A shocking act leaves a woman brutalized and left for dead by three sleazy men. Unfortunately for her assailants, she survives and soon begins a relentless quest for bloody revenge.

programme.title: Mad God
programme.desc: A figure known as The Assassin descends from the heavens into a nightmarish pit full of monsters, titans and cruelty.

programme.title: One Cut of the Dead
programme.desc: Real zombies attack a hack director and a film crew who are shooting a low budget zombie film in an abandoned WWII Japanese facility.

programme.title: Dark Glasses
programme.desc: Diana, a prostitute who was blinded by a serial killer in a botched attack, takes in a young Chinese boy named Chin, abruptly altering both of their lives forever.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: A trainee nurse arrives for her first day at the empty East London Royal Infirmary, where she's forced to face her own traumatic past to confront the malevolent force that's intent on destroying everything around her.

programme.title: Mandy
programme.desc: An outsider seeks bloody vengeance against the sadistic cult leader who destroyed his peaceful existence.

programme.desc: A heart-pounding journey into the grim underbelly of the forgotten '80s through five tales of terror on a taped-over made-for-TV documentary.

programme.title: Watcher
programme.desc: As a serial killer stalks the city, a young actress who just moved to town with her boyfriend notices a mysterious stranger watching her from across the street.

programme.desc: A woman must confront an ancient and powerful entity after her daughter mysteriously vanishes in the cellar of their new home.

programme.title: Satan's Slaves
programme.desc: After dying from a strange illness that she suffered for three years, a mother returned home to pick up her children.

programme.title: The Room
programme.desc: A couple discover a strange room in their new house that grants material wishes, but all they want is a child.

programme.title: Hellbender
programme.desc: A teen and her mother live simply in a home in the woods, spending their time making metal music. A chance encounter with a fellow teen causes her to uncover a connection between her family and witchcraft, which causes a rift with her mother.

programme.title: V/H/S/99
programme.desc: A teen's home videos lead to a series of horrifying revelations.

programme.desc: A desperate drifter suffering from partial memory loss agrees to look after his landlord's psychologically troubled niece in an isolated island mansion.

programme.title: The Mortuary Collection

programme.title: Host
programme.desc: Six friends accidentally invite the attention of a demonic presence during an online séance and begin noticing strange occurrences in their homes.

programme.title: Horror Noire: A History of Black Horror

programme.desc: It’s playtime for Travis & Justin when offshore guide Josh Sauls shares a secret honey hole and his fishing ancestry. Then luck shines when the guys find another sweet spot on the way back.

programme.desc: The irresistibly serene gulf waters off Panama City Beach lure Justin into taking Capt. Ed Zyak out to see what's biting. It quickly turns into a study session and a lesson. Patience + perseverance = success.

programme.desc: Justin has spent a lifetime buying, selling and rigging boats to fit his angling needs. Learn what you need to ask yourself before shopping for the perfect boat and what to look for at the dealership.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: The boys are back in the Florida Keys fishing with Capt. Tony Murphy from the Saltwater Angler tackle shop in Key West aboard his 32’ SeaVee. Tony takes the boys into the Gulf of Mexico to chase Permit on wrecks using live crabs for bait. The Gulf doesn’t disappoint and also provides plenty of action from other Florida Keys species.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: With slow pitch jigging being the newest craze, Rush and buddy Dane head out to test some new tackle and go for “mutton or nothing.” Meanwhile in California, Ali gets his hand on the new gear and prepares to hop a flight and join in on the “slow pitch” party with the guys in Key West.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: When the weather in San Diego throws the crew a curveball, Ali, Rush and friend Brandon Nelson put together plan B. Targeting Yellowtail and Mako sharks, the guys search for kelp paddies on the horizon and look to friend at the fish house for some “shark attractant” to make it all come together.

programme.desc: "Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor patiently pursue big tarpon from the Everglades to the Middle Keys with fly rod in hand.".

programme.title: Captain's Log
programme.desc: Captain Jonathan Moss travels to Melbourne, on Florida’s Space Coast, to cast flies with Capt. Noah Miler at some unforgettable fish.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: With the local Key West ship wrecks covered in Permit, Rush takes good friend and marine artist KC Scott fishing for "inspiration." While permit is the plan, the boys stay rigged and ready for the numerous species the Florida Keys may deliver when fishing offshore.

programme.title: Fly Shop Tour
programme.desc: Welcome to The Fly Shop Tour! In September of 2022, we set across the Rocky Mountains on a 2500 Mile Road Trip visiting & fishing with local Fly Shops. Our Mission? To highlight small businesses that drive the sport we love: Fly Fishing! Along the way, we got a chance to host meetups in every state - all with the goal to raise money for local conservation organizations & meet some of our fans. Follow us as we tell the story of 12 unique fly shops, fish the waters surrounding their area, and make our way throughout the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Destination Dive
programme.desc: In this episode we will dive the beautiful reefs and wrecks of Key Largo. We will showcase research that is being done in Key Largo to protect reefs worldwide.

programme.title: Dirty 30
programme.sub-title: "Lake Okeechobee - A Look Inside Pro Bass Fishing"
programme.desc: In the second episode, we follow Mike Iaconelli to the Bassmaster Elite Series on legendary Lake Okeechobee. As the camera rolls, we dive deep into the fishing world, shedding light on the industry and exploring the untold stories from Ike’s incredible 30-year career on the road. - From behind-the-scenes moments to raw, unfiltered insights, this episode peels back the curtain on what it really takes to thrive in professional fishing. Get ready for some dirt, real talk, BIG FISH, and an up-close look at one of the sport’s most legendary figures.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: Similar to any good Cajun dish, a successful duck camp requires preparation. The last day on dry land is filled with essential stops to get ready for 5 days on the Bayou. Whether making sure we have the right ingredients for our favorite meals, or getting the boats brushed up and ready for action, the day before can be just as important as the day of.

programme.title: The Green Way Outdoors
programme.desc: Kyle Green explores the 10,000 islands off the West Coast of Florida on his Sea-Doo while trying to catch fish after red tide. If the idea of camping off the grid, only eating what you catch, and discovering remains of thousand-year-old civilizations excites you, this is an episode you won't want to miss.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: Danny meets up with Jeff Coffee of ZOE angling group to talk shop, tie flies and fish in one of the most biodiverse lakes in the country.

programme.title: Stomping Grounds
programme.sub-title: "Alaska's Massive Marvels: A Boating Expedition through America's Last Frontier Pt 2
programme.desc: From battling towering 12-foot waves in the Gulf of Alaska, to reeling in colossal 200 lb. halibut, they discover firsthand the rugged beauty of America's 49th state. This episode highlights Lindell Yachts as a top builder of rugged offshore sportfishing yachts, as well as Radon Boats as great pilothouse fishing and guide boats.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.sub-title: DIRT - "Louisiana's Wild Food & Award-Winning Cuisine - Hog Hunting, Swamp Fishing & MORE"
programme.desc: In Episode 2: New Orleans, Josh links up with Mason Hereford (owner of award-winning sandwich shop Turkey and the Wolf) and then hits the road for some epic hog hunting, swamp fishing, crawfish and oyster harvesting, and exploring Louisiana’s only water buffalo dairy farm. It all culminates in one incredible feast featuring unique regional dishes prepared by Mason with the help of some local friends.

programme.title: Fishing With Jay
programme.desc: READY TO ROLL!!…almost - We have our bus. We have our boat. And we have Mr. J. Rockfish on board to steer the ship. But before we can hit the road, we’ve got some work to do. - The bus…it needs a new motor and maybe some other stuff (TBD) that’s been hiding under 40 years of crust and crud… - The boat, it needs some fiberglass work. A casting platform and floor would be cool…maybe a paint job. - And Jay, well his gear is pretty shot, and his normally ripped physique has been obscured under some COVID poundage he acquired over the past year or so…And maybe a pedicure and haircut are in order before stepping in front of the camera… - First, the bus. A little interior decorating perhaps. - The 14 seats built for preschoolers don’t quite accommodate over-sized fishing dudes. And, come to find out, there are no rod racks. No bar. No stereo. No beds. No fly-tying stations. And no beer fridge. How did those kids survive? - Time to gut this thing…Check it out! #fishingwithjay.

programme.title: Fishing With Jay
programme.sub-title: "Fly Fishing For Snook in Indian River Lagoon"
programme.desc: With Tampa Bay suffering from a tragic red tide, Court left his home waters to fish with Jay and Casey in our backyard, the flats of Indian River and Mosquito Lagoon.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh heads offshore for the first day of red snapper season with his friend Joe Koenraad.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: We love our members. We spent some time in camp with Ron Chandler. Ron Recently renewed his TTHA Membership in 2022 and was awarded a member hunt for 2023. We spend time reflecting on what hunting means to Ron and spending time in camp at G2 with hunters alike.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Follow TTHA President/CEO Christina Pittman and her husband Matt this week as they tag along side Dr. James Kroll for his annual deer day! This is a great opportunity to learn from one of the best. We are blessed to be able to share his knowledge with other like minded outdoor enthusiasts.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Cable is a huge supporter of Texas Hunting and everything Teas Trophy Hunters. We are blessed to spend a few days with hum at the beautiful Saddle Creek Ranch in Brady Texas. Greg has a tight management plan and we are glad we got to enjoy his ranch with him and his team.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: We love our college chapters. Hudson has been a long time member of TTHA as well as serving with the Texas A&M Chapter. We have a great time at G2 in pursuit of Axis deer.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.sub-title: DIRT - "Exploring New York City's Hidden Culinary Gems: Cooking Goat Brains, Lobster & MORE"
programme.desc: New. York. City. That’s where our host Josh Rosen kicks off his journey in Episode 4—and where he lived for 16 years and started up the surf-centric apparel brand, Saturdays NYC. Back in his old stomping grounds, Josh first meets up with the award-winning chef and Mumbai native, Chintan Pandya, currently blowing up the New York food scene with his unapologetic and authentic Indian cuisine (pro tip: try the goat brains). Next, Josh travels through the boroughs, heads upstate, and along the coast to source local ingredients—from sake brewers and pig farmers to catching fresh lobster just 100 miles from Wall Street. As always the adventure will end with a feast, right back in Chintan’s kitchen.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.sub-title: DIRT - "Alaskan Fishing, Foraging, & Mountainside Cooking with Local Legends"
programme.desc: Hop in the float plane—a new episode of DIRT just dropped. The DIRT crew made their way to Alaska, “the land of earth, sea, and sky.” All feast, no sleep is the name of the game as Josh makes the most of Alaska’s abundant and legendary daylight alongside local guides, fishermen, and even a couple grizzlies. There’ll be plenty of time to hibernate in winter. But for now—join us—there are halibut to filet, rainforest ’shrooms to forage, and mountainside meals to cook up.

programme.title: FinQuest
programme.desc: Ryan Miller targets exotic fish in Lake Ida with local guide Kevin Cannon in Episode 2 of FinQuest. Catching peacock bass and clown knife fish, Ryan also enjoys family fun with a skimboarding session in Jupiter, Florida.

programme.title: FinQuest
programme.desc: In Episode 3 of FinQuest, Ryan Miller joins Captain Alex from Supremacy Fishing Charters for an offshore adventure targeting big fish off shore. Starting at the Palm Beach Inlet, the team uses planar fishing techniques to hook wahoo and other catches like kingfish and amberjack. Along the way, firefighter Johnny Bennett shares his journey from fishing to starting a popular fish dip business. The day wraps up with thrilling doubleheader catches and a conservation message, showcasing the importance of sustainable fishing practices.

programme.title: FinQuest
programme.desc: In Episode 4 of FinQuest, Ryan Miller explores Jupiter’s Inner Coastal Waterway, blending fishing, paddleboarding, and community engagement. With the help of Matthew from Jupiter Live Bait, Ryan showcases bait preparation techniques before catching snook in the vibrant ICW. He highlights Jupiter's community spirit by joining a local clean-up initiative with Jeremy from Blue Line Paddleboards. The episode features paddleboarding adventures with Ryan’s family, connecting with nature and marine life, and ends with a conservation message about preserving Jupiter’s pristine environment.

programme.title: FinQuest
programme.desc: In Episode 5 of FinQuest, Ryan Miller dives into the vibrant world of offshore fishing off the coast of Palm Beach County. Joined by Cabo Mike, they showcase expert bait techniques and strategies, reeling in a variety of catches, including bonita and a stunning mahi mahi. The duo shares insights into their fishing setup, explains the use of daisy chains, and celebrates their exciting day at sea. With breathtaking views of the ocean and a colorful array of fish, Ryan’s passion for saltwater fishing shines through. The episode wraps up with a reflection on the beauty and bounty of Palm Beach County waters.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: The story of Team Winchester shooters Zach Kienbaum and Desirae Edmunds is told. Zach and Desi discuss how they got started in the shooting sports and how important coaching has become to both of them. They also talk shooting tips. Theo Ribbs breaks down the shotgun sports while Chris Keefer, Casey Keefer, Paul Sawyer, Nikki Boxler and Gabe Adair have a friendly sporting clays competition.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: The Pacific Northwest does not have the easiest conditions to train in for this shooting sports team. For this Seattle-based SST Ravens, this skeet and trap team finds that the challenging weather they train in comes in handy when competing. Also: Competition shooting tips form pro shooter Theo Ribbs.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Every spring brings a new opportunity to take a step forward & recall the memories of seasons past. World War II Veteran and retired Judge Arden Hill has spent most of his life chasing turkeys in the hills of Tennessee. Now in his 90’s, Arden doesn’t let age stand in the way of his love for spring turkey hunting. Also: patterning turkey shotguns and hunting spring gobblers.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Winchester introduces the Shoot United brand aimed at offering useful information and tips to the millions of new shooters entering the shooting sports. New York native and Midland University competitive shotgun shooter Amy Cawley and her journey as a student-athlete is followed. Also: Theo Ribbs gives shooting tips for competition and Foster Bartholow reviews Winchester AA Diamond Grade.

programme.title: Ship Shape TV
programme.desc: During this episode of Ship Shape TV Essentials the SSTV team is at - John’s lake house on Tupper Lake, NY. They are checking out some of the damage done to John’s pontoon decking from freezing weather they received. John and the team are upgrading the material, and adding carpeting to the pontoon decking. We also get some information on SPX-Johnson bilge pumps and the ease of access they provide.

programme.title: Ship Shape TV
programme.desc: During this episode of Ship Shape TV Essentials the SSTV team is at - John’s lake house on Tupper Lake, NY, where they are tackling a new paint Job using Interlux’s paint specifically designed for aluminum hulls. John and the crew take us step by step on what takes to paint on aluminum hulls as well as some other tips from guest hosts.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.sub-title: "Opening Week in Mississippi started off with a BANG!!"
programme.desc: Opening day in Mississippi has arrived and Slade is taking full advantage of it! With the weather not cooperating Slade and Zeb stumble into a turkey hunt they won't soon forget. Two days later, the hot streak continues with Slade connecting on another turkey on an 83 acre property he has for sale! Also, Slade gives some tips and his ideas on small acreage hunting, and how it can be just as lucrative as big tracks of land!

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: In this episode, Slade and his son take on the turkey woods for an afternoon hunt. Although the woods remained quiet, a tom soon snuck out of the woods and on the end of Bentley's barrel! After that Slade was able to help a client of his harvest his first turkey! And boy was it an action packed hunt! Jakes, hens, and tons of gobbles, This hunt is spectacular! Lastly, Slade introduces a property that we have already made a video on, but with just how amazing the land is, we had to include it! Floweree is the epitome of a sportsman's paradise!

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: When overnight temps go low and the tides go lower, it forces Redfish to move. Justin & Travis break out a new micro skiff to see how low they can go to ambush shifting redfish on the flats.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: It’s playtime for Travis & Justin when offshore guide Josh Sauls shares a secret honey hole and his fishing ancestry. Then luck shines when the guys find another sweet spot on the way back.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: The irresistibly serene gulf waters off Panama City Beach lure Justin into taking Capt. Ed Zyak out to see what's biting. It quickly turns into a study session and a lesson. Patience + perseverance = success.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Justin has spent a lifetime buying, selling and rigging boats to fit his angling needs. Learn what you need to ask yourself before shopping for the perfect boat and what to look for at the dealership.

programme.title: HuntStand Presents
programme.desc: Will Cooper finally trades 3 years of tough times for triumph in his quest to tag an out-of-state buck with a bow.

programme.title: HuntStand Presents
programme.desc: Join Will Cooper on an unforgettable adventure in the Colorado mountains, where he dedicated three years chasing elusive bull elk without success. Determined to turn the tide, Will enlists the expertise of his good friend Jermaine Hodge, prior World Elk Calling Champion and Wrestling Coach for the United States Army World Class Athlete Program. Together, they face challenges and overcome adversity during a thrilling public land over-the-counter rifle hunt. Experience the highs and lows of their journey against the stunning backdrop of Colorado's wilderness.

programme.title: HuntStand Presents
programme.desc: In the wide world of western big game, pronghorn antelope hunting in Wyoming is unmatched in its accessibility and excitement. It’s an active pursuit, typically ripe with plenty of opportunities to spot and stalk black-horned bucks. This makes it an ideal forum for riflemen looking to scratch their western itch.

programme.title: HuntStand Presents
programme.desc: After several years of shifting focus back to his native whitetails, Dahlke returns to mule deer country with the Muley Freak, Erik Van Woerkom. Follow along on this Utah mule deer hunt.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: In this episode Slade and the old Trained Assassins (TAT) crew head to Montrose, Colorado where they meet up with Slade’s dad, Bear Cub, TJ, and George for a heck of a week at Elk Camp. This is all going on now on Hunting Land Man TV.

programme.desc: Batter Batter Swing………. Well, you might see where this might be headed. But, Hey!! Slade is in the great state of Kansas. Its mid-October and hes looking to bring home Lori some extra home décor.

programme.desc: A Southwest Mississippi GIANT “Barry” has Slade’s brain in scrambles as he is preparing to head to Iowa after waiting 5 years to finally draw his tag. The chase is on let’s see if the Hunting Land Man can seal a deal!

programme.desc: Capt. Mike Anderson takes pro baseball player Austin Medows Bass fishing.

programme.desc: Jared Dieguz has been fishing all his life and now that he's running his own charter business, finding a day to "scout" the sea is more important than ever.

programme.title: Life On The Water
programme.desc: Brandon explores the sunken vessels and beautiful waters of the Florida Panhandle with local guide, Brady Hale.

programme.title: Life On The Water
programme.desc: Brandon learns how to return fish caught out of deep water using a descending device, a tool that is helping conserve the fish population everywhere that it is being used.

programme.title: Operation Healing Heroes

programme.title: The Raven Project

programme.title: HuntStand Presents
programme.sub-title: "Second Chance - Hunting the November Rut in Ohio"
programme.desc: Hunting has a way of grounding us, reminding us of what truly matters: shared moments and unforgettable memories. Chance and Ashleigh Eckert are on their first out-of-state hunt in the rolling hills of Ohio. After overcoming a life-changing kidney transplant, their story is one of faith, love, and resilience. While the goal was a big buck, the true reward was the time spent together and the lessons learned along the way. Because hunting is about so much more than the harvest — it’s about the journey.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: Knowing when to spot and stalk is crucial for any hunter. In this episode of DDH-TV, Mark Kayser breaks down three key factors for success, while Dan Schmidt puts them into action as he stalks a buck in Nebraska’s Sandhills.

programme.title: Pure Hunting
programme.desc: Good friend Mike Stone invites Willi to hunt his family ranch in Oklahoma. Good friend, Tom Petry goes along to film for his school, “Film The Hunt” and hopefully capture Willi shooting a good, Oklahoma buck.

programme.title: Pure Hunting
programme.desc: Willi spends 8 days chasing a few bucks, but has sights set on “High Beam”. After a few encounters and one on his last morning, he hopes for last minute success on his last afternoon.

programme.title: Realtree Roadtrips
programme.sub-title: Road Trips - "Crazy Rut Chaos In Georgia- Realtree Road Trips"
programme.desc: Filming your own bow hunts can be challenging. Throw in some crazy rut chaos and it can be just about impossible. Bouncing around in a Summit climber proved to be a deadly tactic for Bryan Brown as he was able to get tight to the bedding area where 5 bucks were chasing 1 hot doe.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: The story of the game changing 350 Legend cartridge is documented at deer camps across the midwest with the Keefer Brothers in Kansas, Mark and Terry Drury in Missouri, Melissa Bachman in Nebraska and Team Winchester back in Missouri.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Charles Rodney’s relationship with his hunting dogs, passion for field-to-table living and connection to the land make his love for chasing rabbits contagious while the heritage of Winchester’s small game ammunition makes this beloved pastime accessible for generations to come. Also: a Model 42 collection for the ages and hunting Kansas coyotes with the Keefer Brothers.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.sub-title: "Half Way There - Chilean Wigeon & Rosy Bill - , South America Waterfowl Slam"
programme.desc: Mark Peterson closes out the half way point on the South America Waterfowl Slam. On just the third day of the hunt, he is able to take a Chilean Wigeon and a Rosy Billed Pochard which make species number 9 and 10 of the 20 on his list. Mark is still sharing the blind with Matt Gindorff, a WTA consultant, and they discuss waterfowl hunting in Argentina and how it compares to that of the U.S.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Texas is the home to many exotic species that can be hunted. One species in particular, Axis, have a very large population. Our team got together and had a great time hanging out with a land owner and hunting Axis deer.

Adventures of Power
programme.desc: A mineworker and dreamer - Power - must overcome obstacles and ridicule to become the world's greatest air-drummer.

programme.title: Dial M For Murder
programme.desc: Ex-tennis pro Tony Wendice (Ray Milland) wants to have his wealthy wife, Margot (Grace Kelly), murdered so he can get his hands on her inheritance. When he discovers her affair with Mark Halliday (Robert Cummings), he comes up with the perfect plan to kill her.

programme.title: The Lightkeepers
programme.desc: A grumpy sailor (Richard Dreyfuss) and a young stranger (Tom Wisdom) change their negative opinions about women when two move nearby.

programme.title: Check Point
programme.desc: A vagrant discovers plans for an invasion in America and notifies the local sheriff about the plot. When the sheriff notices odd things happening after dismissing the claims, he begins to investigate the existence of a sleeper cell in the small town.

programme.title: Arcadia
programme.desc: A man (John Hawkes) takes his children on a cross-country move to California and tries to hide the truth about their mother's absence.

programme.title: Numb
programme.desc: A couple in financial distress find GPS coordinates that supposedly lead to a fortune in stolen gold. Desperate for the money, they team up with two hitchhikers to enter a remote winter wilderness to recover the loot.

programme.title: Living and Dying
programme.desc: Two killers hijack a trio of robbers' plans, and hold up a bank themselves. Under lockdown by the police, the robbers must become heroes and save the day before the killers strike.

programme.title: Night Of The Living Dead
programme.desc: The radiation from a fallen satellite causes the recently deceased to rise from the grave and seek the living to use as food.

programme.title: Death Ship
programme.desc: Survivors of a tragic shipping collision are rescued by a mysterious black ship which appears out of the fog. Little do they realise that the ship is a Nazi torture ship which has sailed the seas for years, luring unsuspecting sailors.

programme.title: 2B Perfectly Honest
programme.desc: Two men (Adam Trese, Andrew McCarthy) have different ways of coping with the untimely failure of their Internet business.

programme.title: McLintock
programme.desc: Aging rancher George Washington McLintock (John Wayne), a wealthy self-made man, is forced to deal with numerous personal and professional problems. Seemingly everyone wants a piece of his enormous farmstead, including high-ranking government men, McLintock's own sons and nearby Native Americans.
